name: FLTR-L Module
description:
Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Mining Module (Passive)
Extraction Rate: -40%
Inert Materials: -15%
Reduce the amount inert material collected from deposits with the FLTR-L Module. Though the extraction rate will slow considerably, the FLTR-L's patented filtration system screens out inert material to leave more storage space for valuable ore.
description_cn:
制造商：灰猫工业
物品类型：采矿模块(被动)
\提取速度：-40%
惰性材料：-15%
用FLTR-L模块减少从矿床中收集惰性材料的数量。尽管萃取速度将大大放缓，但FLTR-L的专利过滤系统会过滤掉惰性物质，为有价值的矿石留出更多的存储空间。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-新巴贝奇(New Babbage)-ShubinInterstellar
